scripts.gen: fvm flutter pub run build_runner build --delete-conflicting-outputs
scripts.clean: fvm flutter clean && fvm flutter pub get
scripts.pod: cd ios && rm -rf Podfile.lock && pod install
scripts.aab: fvm flutter build bundle --flavor development -t lib/mains/main_development.dart
scripts.aab:stg: fvm flutter build bundle --flavor staging -t lib/mains/main_staging.dart
scripts.aab:prod: fvm flutter build bundle --flavor production lib/mains/main_production.dart
scripts.apk: fvm flutter build apk --flavor development -t lib/mains/main_development.dart
scripts.apk:stg: fvm flutter build apk --flavor staging -t lib/mains/main_staging.dart
scripts.apk:prod: fvm flutter build apk --flavor production -t lib/mains/main_production.dart
scripts.amend: git add . && git commit --amend && git fetch origin develop && git rebase origin/develop
